00149   Link* Intersection::getInLink(string id){
00150     for(LinkSet::iterator li = in_links.begin(); li != in_links.end(); li++)
00151       if((*li)->getId() == id) return *li;
00152     return NULL;
00153   }

00162     return NULL;

00170   Detector* Intersection::getDetector(int scatsId){
00171     for(DetectorSet::iterator dt = detectors.begin(); dt != detectors.end(); dt++)
00172       if((*dt)->getScatsId() == scatsId) return *dt;
00173     return NULL;

00180   Phase* Intersection::getPhase(string id){

00190   int Intersection::getPhaseIndex(Phase* pe){
00191     int pos = 0;
00192     for(PhaseSet::iterator p = this->phases.begin(); p != this->phases.end(); p++, pos++)
00193       if( (*p) == pe ) return pos;
00194     assert( 1 == 0); // Should not pass here
00195     return pos;
00196   }
00197 
00198 
00203   Phase* Intersection::getPhaseByIndex(int pos){
00204     int pos_v = 0;
00205     for(PhaseSet::iterator p = this->phases.begin(); p != this->phases.end(); p++, pos_v++)
00206       if( pos_v == pos ) return *p;
00207     assert( 1 == 0); // Should not pass here
00208     return NULL;       
00209   }

00222   Phase* Intersection::getNextPhase(Phase* cp){
00223     string id = cp->getId();
00224     for(PhaseSet::iterator p = phases.begin(); p != phases.end(); p++)
00225       if((*p)->getId() == id){
00226         p++;
00227         if(p == phases.end()) return *(phases.begin());
00228         return *p;
00229       }
00230     return NULL;    
00231   }
